pages.text: While a petal may seem delicate and fragile, when imbued with wild magic it can be a formidable shield.$(br2)When cast, you gain a number of petals that shield you from attacks, and each of these can completely absorb an attack.$(br2)With modifiers, additional effects can be inflicted upon attackers, or you can increase the number of petals gained.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:petal_shell/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Shells:$() You can have a maximum of $(spell:petal_shell/maximum_shells), although this value increases by $(spell:petal_shell/extra_shells) with the $(modifier:petal_overflow)$() modifier enabled.$(br2)$(bold)Colour:$() With the $(modifier:mossy_leaves)$() modifier enabled, the petals display as green rather than pink.$(br2)$(bold)Radiant Damage:$() With the

$(modifier:react_radiance)$() modifier enabled, an attacker breaking a shield takes $(spell:petal_shell/HEART/radiant_damage) hearts o fradiant damage.$(br2)$(bold)Familiars:$() With the $(modifier:peaceful_dance)$() modifier, a nearby familiar is also granted shields.$(br2)$(bold)Slash & Bleed Damage:$() With the $(modifier:react_daggers)$() modifier enabled, an attacker takes $(spell:petal_shell/HEART/dagger_damage) hearts of damage and is given Bleeding $(spell:petal_shell/ROMAN/bleed_amplifier) for $(spell:petal_shell/SECONDS/bleed_duration), causing damage over time.

$(bold)Poison Damage:$() With the $(modifier:react_poison)$() modifier enabled, attackers are given Poison $(spell:petal_shell/ROMAN/poison_amplifier) for $(spell:petal_shell/SECONDS/poison_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Levitation:$() With the $(modifier:react_drift)$() modifier enabled, attackers are given Levitation I for $(spell:petal_shell/SECONDS/levitate_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Fire Damage:$() With the $(modifier:react_fire)$() modifier enabled, attackers take $(spell:petal_shell/HEART/fire_damage) hearts of fire damage and are set ablaze for $(spell:petal_shell/fire_duration) seconds.

$(bold)Weakness:$() With the $(modifier:react_weakness)$() modifier enabled, attackers are given Weakness $(spell:petal_shell/ROMAN/weakness_amplifier) for $(spell:petal_shell/SECONDS/weakness_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Slowness:$() With the $(modifier:react_slow)$() modifier enabled, attackers are given Slowness $(spell:petal_shell/ROMAN/slow_amplifier) for $(spell:petal_shell/SECONDS/slow_duration) seconds.
